body.name: YESTEL Android 13 Tablet 11 Inch Display,16GB RAM+256GB ROM,Octa-Core Processor,8600mAh Large Battery,2000 * 1200 Pixels,GPS/ 5G WiFi/Bluetooth/with Case-Blue
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 6 hrs 54 mins
features: ✅【Android 13+2.0Ghz Octa-Core Processor】The powerful T15 tablet runs Android 13 and is powered by an advanced 2.0GHz octa-core processor, giving this latest Android 13 tablet lightning-fast speeds for smooth, snappy performance whether you're working, playing or doing it all.

✅【256GB ROM Large Storage】16(8+8)GB + 256GB &1TB Expandable- YESTEL T15 11 inch tablet comes with 16GB RAM (8GB original+8GB expandable) and 256GB ROM. In addition, it can be expanded up to 1TB with a TF card (card not included) for extra storage. Large capacity memory, free to download and store your favorite books, songs, photos, movies, games, etc.

✅【Large 11-inch display+Ultra HD pixels】The T15 tablet features a 2000*1200 resolution and four speakers, delivering stunning visuals with vibrant colours and sharp details. The Vivid 11-inch screen offers a cinematic viewing experience whether you're streaming your favourite movies or playing your favourite games.

✅【8600 mAh Long Battery Life】The powerful 8600mAh battery gives you over 10 hours of non-stop entertainment. Whether you're on the move or working from home, the T15 tablet keeps you connected and productive around the clock.

✅【Free 2 years Warranty】With its durable metal body and portable design, the YESTEL T15 Tablet with GPS is an ideal gift for adults, seniors and children. YESTEL firmly guarantees the quality of our products and offers every customer a free two-year full warranty and lifetime technical support and 24-hour online customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m really enjoying my Yestel 13 tablet purchase! It is affordable and performs really well with a beautiful high definition 11 inch screen. The tablet holds a charge for a very long time which is very impressive. I chose it for the larger screen I highly recommend this tablet and seller. You can't go wrong with this great tablet. Don't waste twice the money and buy a name brand tablet that does the same exact thing as this little beauty. I also like the case that came with it I just wish it was a darker blue. I use it mostly for reading and gaming. Works exactly as I need it to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great alternative to other popular tablets
reviews.reviewText: I'm a software engineer with a lifetime of experience with gadgets of all shapes and sizes. I feel like I can accurately review this from both a technology and a consumer standpoint but I will try to keep it short and sweet as these reviews can get pretty lengthy.I had originally planned to purchase a very popular tablet that came from the "rain forest", peddled by a merchant who's name rhymes with shmeff pesos.I was annoyed to find out that shmeff's tablet didn't have the google play store and I'd need to jump through a bunch of hoops to use it as a normal android tablet. I was also annoyed that shmeff offers a versions that has lock screen ads which I find to be just abominable regardless of the price savings as I feel like this is not something that should ever be normalized.This tablet has roughly double the overall specs of the best rain forest tablet and it's a regular Android device which means it's not locked into any ecosystem and you can do whatever you want with it. This is the way technology should be.Now that the philosophical part is out of the way, here's what I do with it and how well it works for me:I mainly bought this to use as a portable media device, basically a small TV. For that reason, I really appreciate the 2K screen which is of excellent quality. I use this with Plex, Netflix, Prime Video, Hulu, etc. and it works great with all of them because it's a completely unlocked android device.- The overall fit and finish of the device is great. It feels solid and build quality is tight. 5 stars- It's very thin overall and has thin bezels so it feels like a premium device- When using the device, there are a few times where it's felt a just a peck sluggish but overall it's pretty snappy and doesn't have any issues whatsoever. HOWEVER, if your comparison is a tablet made by shmim brook or the late shmeve hobs, you may feel like it's under-powered or less polished than it could be in the UI/UX department. This is likely because this tablet costs a quarter of the price and because you are comparing apples to macadamia nuts.For the price, I think this is the best option. If you are extremely tech challenged, you may prefer to be trapped in the rain forest where everything is spoon-fed to you but if you can watch a youtube video to solve a problem, you can have a better device at the same or less cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Battery life is lacking!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great tablet except for battery life. At 97% showed 4hrs 15min left. Fortunately I use it at home plugged in. Not a mobile unit. Everything else about this unit is great. Screen is crystal clear, bright and sharp. Touch screen sensitivity is just right. Videos play with no lag or stuttering. Sound is good, not exceptional but, hey it's a tablet. For the money it can't be beat!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Value for the Price
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I am impressed with the quality, build, performance and accessories included with this unit. For the price it cannot be beat. The screen protector also came installed which saved me headache to have to worry about bubbled and in case needed, there are extra screen protectors as well. I was able to purchase a small tablet carrying case that very conveniently fits everything that came with the tablet. For me, this is dual use, which is work and play. I can run work apps without problem and will run android games with reasonable performance. All in all, I'd say 10/10 for what I needed this for. Again, for the price, it just cannot be beat. It also came with more ram and professing power than any of the other choices so this one was an easy desicion to make.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Glorified Alarm Clock/file reader
reviews.reviewText: The screen looks nice and that's it. The screen is buggy and filled with latency, fails to load most apps i have tried. Within 2 weeks I decided this will only be used for spotify and an alarm clock, with the occasional file reader. It's great for reading documents. But the processor or cpu or whatever makes things run smoothly and allows it to send commands, is garbage. So if all you want to do is download and read files, sure I can recommend it for that. Anything beyond that I'd urge you use a different option.
